mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a.room_name `name`, CONCAT(a.group_name, '-', a.`name`) `icon`, count(b.room_id) `data` FROM t_snh_member a LEFT OUTER JOIN t_snh_room_message b ON a.room_id = b.room_id WHERE b.message_time >= #{beginDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} AND b.message_time <= #{endDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} AND a.room_monitor = 1 GROUP BY b.room_id, a.room_name, a.group_name, a.`name` ) c ORDER BY c.`data` DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT CONCAT(b.group_name, '-', b.`name`) `name`, b.avatar icon, COUNT(a.sender_id) `data` FROM t_snh_room_message a LEFT OUTER JOIN t_snh_member b ON a.sender_id = b.id WHERE a.message_time >= #{beginDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} AND b.room_monitor = 1 GROUP BY a.sender_id ) c ORDER BY c.`data` DESC LIMIT 5
